com.pdfjet
Class Cell

java.lang.Object
  com.pdfjet.Cell

public class Cell
extends java.lang.Object

Used to create table cell objects. See the Table class for more information.

          Creates a cell object and sets the font.

setNoBorders

public void setNoBorders()
